cpg.mvc.crossword.model

Class WordList

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpg.mvc.crossword.model.WordList

  • public class WordList
extends java.lang.Object
    The WordList consists of an ObservableList of Words. This is the main word list to use for crossword construction. A "Word" consists of keyword (the word to be guessed) and a list of clues (hints for a specific keyword).

    The word list is sorted at any time.
    See Also:
    Word
